## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7a31aff9b73f313c920ebbb6370e3afc3139565f139114ab47ef7859e989f418)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'jscrambler-dashboard-components' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
